title: Finding the S Spot Career Pleasure Secrets for Merging Skills
description: Is your career ecstatic? Do you wake up excited to work on your passions, projects and purpose? Don't laugh: that's an actual reality for many people...and a possibility for all. Finding the S Spot: Career Pleasure Secrets for Merging Skills, Play and Pay was written to give you the insights and awareness of how and where to discover work so sweet you gotta smile.Don't let the playful title fool you. This is an in-depth piece of educational, self-reflective and self-assessment career material. It is packed full of insights, exercises and inquiries to have you gain clarity around your ideal career where passion and joy can flow.
author: Darrell W. Gurney
